data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Leova, Moldova, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Leova, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Leova, Moldova that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Leova, Moldova.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Leova to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, teach the 2,069 believers in the state of Leova the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Leova, Moldova to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Leova, Moldova to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Leova, Moldova. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Leova, Moldova has a population of 44,800.

We estimate Leova has 2,069 people who might know Jesus, 31,746 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,985 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
